description: This is a very popular early season XC ski trail. The elk pass trail is  good for beginners to intermediate XC skiers, while blueberry hill trail is black steep and is only good for advanced XC skiers.
directions: Follow Hwy 1 west out of Calgary to the junction with Hwy 40. Head south on Hwy 40 for approx 56km. At the winter gate turn right onto Kananaskis Lakes Trail and follow it to the Elk Pass parking lot which is 13k from the winter gate.
title: Elk Pass and Blueberry Hill
